content:
As part of our ongoing WTF? Wednesday series we present you with this uncanny image of two men holding out a surging hoard, but why? And where is it taken?
If you guess correctly, or give us a good enough/entertaining answer, our friends over at 
 will give you a free T-Shirt of your choice from their 
 and we’ll give you a ‘big up’ next WTF? Wednesday.
All you have to do is drop a guess in the comments section below, along with your name and email. We’ll then contact you if you win (emails addresses will not be published). Enjoy! .
PS. A teensy weensy clue is: August 31st, 2008
Congrats to Ben who guessed correctly that 
 was a powder-room pit-stop in a Baobab tree, Zambia; a sight which is pretty common around certain parts of Africa.
title: What's the Story Behind this Pic?
author: Chris
